title: We must combat anti-Semitic hate crimes with solidarity, not violence
description: The recent wave of nine violent anti-Semitic attacks in the New York area since mid-December, comes as hate crimes against the Jewish community and attacks on synagogues have increased in the US, the UK and elsewhere. Many politicians and media personalities have fanned the flames of hatred by mainstreaming antisemitism, promulgating conspiracy theorizing tropes about Jewish people and legitimizing hate groups who target racial and religious minorities and promote acts of violence against them.

title: Server gets festive $2,020 tip on $23 meal
description: It's never a bad idea to start the New Year on a generous note.

title: Robert Durst admits writing note giving location of body, lawyer says
description: Real estate tycoon Robert Durst is indeed the author of the anonymous note that alerted police to the location of the body of a close friend he is accused of killing almost 20 years ago, according to his attorney.

title: Former NBA boss David Stern dies at 77
A transgender character is coming to the Marvel Universe
description: Coming soon to a theater near you -- a transgender Marvel character.

title: Kathy Griffin announces surprise New Year's wedding
description: Kathy Griffin announced her engagement on New Year's Eve -- and then she got married.

title: CNN Travel's 20 best places to visit in 2020
description: Whether you want to relax on a remote island off the coast of Africa, ride Germany's coolest trains or spot howling monkeys in South America, there is much to explore heading into a new decade in 2020.

title: Reporter: Bill Gates' 1999 prediction was spot on
description: History is filled with predictions and future projections. But do they ever come true? USA Today reporter Grace Hauck reveals 2020 predictions, made in the 90s, that were correct.

title: See Iran's response to Trump's threat
description: Iranian Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei issued a defiant response following President Trump's threat to Iran following attacks on a US embassy in Baghdad, Iraq.

title: The predictions for 2020 we got horribly wrong
description: You're late for work because you forgot to set the alarm clock embedded in your forearm. Rushing out of bed, you give your family members, located thousands of miles away, a quick virtual hug, and hop into the car -- ordering your ape chauffeur to step on it. It's a stressful day, sure, but at least your vacation to the Moon is just a few days away.

title: Scores of animals killed as fire tears through monkey enclosure at German zoo
description: Scores of animals were killed when a fire tore through a monkey enclosure at Krefeld Zoo in northwestern Germany in the early hours of New Year's Day.

title: 'America should have received our message': Iraq protesters withdraw from US Embassy
description: • How the Trumps spent their New Year's Eve

title: Wonder goal kick starts new football decade
description: Iranian international Alireza Jahanbkhsh scored a wonder goal for Brighton in the first English Premier League match of the new decade to secure his team a precious point in the 1-1 draw with Chelsea.

title: Fire at German zoo kills scores of animals
description: New Year's Day fire at Germany's Krefeld Zoo tore through a monkey enclosure, killing scores of animals including some that were endangered.

title: Teen T. rexes revealed by fossil find
description: Even as teenagers, Tyrannosaurus rex dominated the top of the food chain. Researchers can say that with more certainty after confirming that two small T. rex fossils found in the early 2000s are not a pygmy species of tyrannosaurs, but juveniles of the rex species.

title: Weed is legal in another US state. Here are other new US laws for 2020
description: New year, new rules.

title: How to succeed at your New Year's resolutions this year
description: Do you want to eat better, exercise more, stop vaping or lose weight?

title: Harry and Meghan share sweet new photo of baby Archie
description: Prince Harry and wife Meghan have celebrated the new year with an adorable photo of baby Archie having a cuddle with his dad.

title: How the Trumps spent their New Year's Eve
One of the NY Hanukkah stabbing victims may not regain consciousness, his family says
description: Doctors are not optimistic one of the men stabbed at a New York Hanukkah celebration will regain consciousness, according to the victim's family.

title: Hong Kong New Year's Day march called off after bricks and petrol bombs thrown
description: Hong Kong's ongoing protest movement is showing no signs of stopping in 2020, with tens of thousands of anti-government demonstrators taking to the streets on New Year's Day.

title: Puppies 'ski' and learn to be rescue dogs
description: At Snowmass, Colorado, teams of retrievers learn how to be avalanche rescue dogs. These dogs can cut down rescue time from hours to minutes. By Matt Hobbs/Vital Films

title: 'America should have received our message': Iraq protesters withdraw from US embassy
Cute puffin bird scratches itself, makes history
description: Researchers in England and Iceland have released a video of a puffin scratching itself with a stick.

title: Two skiers killed in an avalanche in British Columbia
description: Two people were killed after getting swept up by a massive avalanche in a mountain pass in British Columbia, Canadian authorities said.

title: US cadets pictured giving a Nazi salute will be fired, West Virginia governor says
Bonsai trees shaped like rats are popular in Vietnam ahead of Lunar New Year
description: It's 2020 -- and with the Lunar New Year just weeks away, farmers in Vietnam have come up with a unique way to herald the Year of the Rat.

title: Twin foreign policy crises greet Trump as election year dawns
description: President Donald Trump is suddenly faced on the first day of election year with hot foreign policy crises with Iran and North Korea that put American lives at risk and could weigh heavily on his own political prospects.

title: Trump says certain e-cigarette flavors will come off the market
description: An announcement that will take certain e-cigarette flavors off the US market is coming soon, President Donald Trump told reporters at Mar-a-Lago on Tuesday.

title: Protesters attack US embassy in Baghdad after airstrikes
description: Analysis: Proxy war between the US and Iran just moved a step closer

title: Pope Francis smacks woman's hand to free himself from her grip
description: Pope Francis was happily greeting children and pilgrims in St. Peter's Square on Tuesday when he slapped a woman's hand to free himself.

title: US sending additional forces to protect embassy threatened by protesters in Iraq
description: The United States will send approximately 750 soldiers to the Middle East immediately, Defense Secretary Mark Esper confirmed in a written statement Tuesday, after attacks broke out in Baghdad among hundreds of protesters in response to airstrikes in Iraq and Syria conducted by US forces on Sunday.

title: Ex-tennis champion claims LGBTQ teaching in schools is controlled by 'the devil'
description: Former tennis champion Margaret Court has reiterated her controversial opinions on the LGBTQ community and transgender athletes, claiming LGBTQ teaching in schools is controlled by "the devil."

title: Mariah Carey's Twitter account appears to have been hacked
description: Mariah Carey ended 2019 with an unfortunate surprise.

title: The right response to cadets' revolting Nazi salute
description: There is a tiny bit of good news at the tail end of the trash fire that was 2019: A Nazi salute will, in some corners of America, get you fired.

title: The 10 biggest sports stars of the decade
description: As a memorable sporting decade draws to a close, we take stock of the men and women who've set the standard for others to follow, on and off the field.

title: TV personality Stacy London introduces girlfriend on Instagram
description: Former "What Not to Wear" host Stacy London is ending 2019 full of "incredible joy," thanks, she says, to her girlfriend of more than a year.

title: Scientist says he's figured out time travel
The most anticipated buildings set to shape the world in 2020
description: The past year in architecture has been filled with milestones, from the completion of Africa's tallest building to the opening of Europe's first underwater restaurant. We also watched in horror as Notre Dame burned, gained new "supertall" skyscrapers and lost industry giants like I.M. Pei and César Pelli.

title: Roberts: Americans take democracy for granted
description: As the country faces unprecedented rancor between the branches of government in the midst of impeachment proceedings, Chief Justice John Roberts urged his fellow federal judges Tuesday to promote confidence in the judiciary and maintain the public's trust.

title: Michelin chef's cheese soufflé case collapses
description: The cheese soufflé was thrown out of court.
